intro.only-members: Only DeepMine team members are allowed access
intro.waxAlreadyExists: WAX wallet is already linked to another account

actionModal.descriptionDMP: This action will be instant and take 0 energy, but will cost:

auth.logAs: You’re logged in as another user {{email}}

mining.tooltipAroundConsumables: This is where improvements are installed that allow you to make mining more efficient. They will be available for the Mine level 1
mining.doWantStopMining: Do you really want to stop mining?
mining.consumablesWillBurnOut: Your consumables will burn out and you won’t be able to use them anymore

pageNotFound.itSeem: It seems like this page doesn’t exist Try going back or click the button bellow and we’ll take you to the city
pageNotFound.weWork: We are working very hard to get this page up as soon as possible For now you can try to go back or click the button bellow and we’ll take you to the city

signingContract.title: Signing the contract
signingContract.description: You should find or create a contract with a Mine Owner to start mining

welcome.title: Welcome, Citizen
welcome.description: You need full equipment set in your active inventory. Check your storage or go to Market to buy.
welcome.descriptionMobile: You need full equipment set in your active inventory.

setup.title: set up the Equipment
setup.description:
To start mining you need to install the equipment 
and you need to perform a physical shit to this location.
setup.descriptionShort: To start mining we need to install the equipment

ready.title: ready to mine
ready.description: You are all set, proceed to the Mining Deck to start mining

miningError.title: mining Was interrupted
miningError.description: Go to the Mining deck to see the cause

miningOver.title: mining is over
miningOver.description: Proceed to the Mining Deck to finalize mining

physicalShiftBadge.text: Do you want to travel here?

menu.manageMine: Go here to manage the Mine
menu.team: Go here to form a team

cabin.noAreaDescription: You need a Area card in your active inventory. Check your storage or go to Market to buy one.
cabin.engageDescription: You need to perform a physical shit to this location
cabin.setupDescription: You need to install a mine on your area to proceed
cabin.mineIsSetTitle: The Mine is set to the land
cabin.mineIsSetDescription: Now you can see the full stastistics

menu.statsAndInfo: Go here to see stats & info

createOrder.feeTooltip: % of DME charged on each dig at the mine.
createOrder.penaltyHint: If the performing party violates the terms of the contract or terminates the contract prematurely, the counterparty may charge a fine.
createOrder.ifDuring: If during the entire contract, the contractor within
createOrder.contractorFined: contractor can be fined and the contract can be terminated with
createOrder.miningTermsHint: If during the entire period of the contract, within the specified number of days, less than the specified amount of DME was extracted, the other party has the right to terminate the contract and collect a penalty
createOrder.startOfOperationTooltip: Time when parties begin performing their obligations upon the contract.
createOrder.redirected: You will be automatically redirected to the main page of the service market

haveNoNftAlert.haveNo: You don’t have an NFT to create this order. Please visit the Marketplace

order.selectMineAndSign: Select mine and sign the order
order.doNotHaveMine: You do not have a mine that meets the conditions of the order
order.doNotHaveMineSlot: You do not have a mine slot that meets the conditions of the order
order.doNotHaveArea: You do not have a area that meets the conditions of the order
order.doNotHaveAreaSlot: You do not have a area slot that meets the conditions of the order

contract.penaltyTerminatedDescription: Counterparty has terminated the contract prematurely and you can collect a penalty for it.
contract.penaltyViolatedDescription: Counterparty violated the terms of the contract. The contract can be terminated without forfeit and you can collect a penalty
contract.noCollectPenaltyAndBreak: Don’t collect and break the contract
contract.collectDescription: Are you sure you want to collect a penalty of {{amount}} DME from the Mine owner?
contract.noCollectDescription: Are you sure you don’t want to collect a penalty of {{amount}} DME from the Mine owner?
contract.youTerminated:
You terminated the contract prematurely.
The counterparty might collect the penalty.
contract.completeContractDescription: The contract has successfully completed. Please confirm this by clicking the button below.

terminateModal.title: Contract termination
terminateModal.description: If you terminate the contract prematurely, you might pay a penalty of {{amount}} DME
terminateModal.success: The contract is terminated. You may have to pay a fine of {{amount}} DME

areaManagement.title: Area management
areaManagement.unengageDescription: Deactivation will result in contractors not being able to start mining
areaManagement.findMineOwner: Find a Mine owner on the servicemarket
areaManagement.createOrder: Create an order for a Mine owner

mineOwner.needMineCardDesktop: You need a Mine in your active inventory to proceed. Pick it in the Storage or go to the Market to buy one.
mineOwner.needMineCardMobile: You need a Mine in your active inventory to proceed
mineOwner.needShift: You need to travel here to set a Mine
mineOwner.needLandLord: Sign a contract with a landlord to set a Mine
mineOwner.needSetupMine: Set up the Mine to continue
mineOwner.needTeamDescription: To start the mine you need to hire contractors
mineOwner.mineManagementDescription: Go to Mine Management unit to activate the Mine
mineOwner.mineIsActiveDescription: Everything is fine, Mine is running. Now you can see the information about the mining process and efficiency
mineOwner.mineIsActiveDescriptionMobile: Now you can see the statistics of the mining process and efficiency
